name: Dessert Desert (Name in progress)
description:
-------- DEV NOTES read me READ ME READ ME READ ME --------

SKILL TREES ARE NOT COMPLETE. DO NOT LEVEL UP "LASER", IT IS USELESS! Upgrades for spells that are not the crystal projectile simply reduce the cooldown and increase the damage of that spell. Crystal is the only good spell because of this. Sorry. Game is at an extremely early state. It is bad and broken, but playable. Have fun. 

The main character is a girl, not a guy, not a penguin.

-------- CONTROLS --------

MOVE - WASD

CAST - LMB

DODGE - SPACEBAR

USE ITEM - Q

ACCEPT - E

SWAP SPELL - 1 2 3 or SCROLL WHEEL

OPEN SKILLTREE - Tap either 1, 2, or 3 depending on which is already chosen

DEBUG CONTROLS

L - skip level

B - fullscreen/windowed

R - restart game

C - screenshot (saves in %appdata%>local>project5)
